pages.text: This butterfly can only be found in $(l)jungle forests$(). A player can lure the painted panther towards them using $(l)cocoa beans$(). When put into a bottle, the painted panther will turn cocao beans into crimson cocao beans. $(br)Note: Crimson cocoa beans look slightly crimson, hence their name.
pages.title: Painted Panther

pages.wings_caption: The wings of the painted panther can be eaten, but poison you. the natural poison could explain the unique flavour of crimson cocao beans.
pages.butterfly_caption: The eyes of the painted panther seem to have night vision
